workout_file.name: W1-Friday-Active Recovery-60mins
workout_file.description: Total duration: 60 minutes. An easy session to promote blood flow and aid muscle repair, ensuring you are fresh for your next key workout. Based on FTP of 228W.

textevent.message: Get ready for some brief activators.
Activators: 30 seconds easy, 30 seconds at FTP. Just to wake the legs up.
Activators complete. Time to settle into the main recovery ride.
Main set: 47 minutes at 135W. Keep this very easy.
The goal here is recovery. Your breathing should be relaxed and conversation easy.
You're doing great. Just keep spinning smoothly.
Main set almost done. Get ready for the cool-down.
Cool-down. Let your heart rate and legs spin down.
